front.title: Definitions of Textual Conventions (TCs) for Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) Management

abstract.t: This draft defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module which contains Textual Conventions to represent commonly used Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) management information. The intent is that these TEXTUAL CONVENTIONS (TCs) will be imported and used in BFD related MIB modules that would otherwise define their own representations.
